pullRequest.title: Panache : deleteById()
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add the deleteById() method for both Hibernate and MongoDB with Panache.
Fixes #6270

afterCommit.message:
Simplify Spring Data JPA deleteById implementation

Use the newly added JpaOperations#deleteById

nodes.bodyText: Shouldn't this be of type Id for coherence with findById(Id) ?
I think we should start with the improved version ;)
Same comment for the Id type.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -703,6 +704,17 @@
         throw ReactiveMongoOperations.implementationInjectionMissing();
     }
 
+    /**
+     * Delete an entity of this type by ID.
+     *
+     * @param id the ID of the entity to delete.
+     * @return false if the entity was not deleted (not found).
+     */
+    @GenerateBridge
+    public default Uni<Boolean> deleteById(Object id) {

nodes.bodyText: See? This one seems optimal, so let's not be unfavourable to ORM ;)
